articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message from Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni on Nov. 24.
					 In the message the president said that he, on behalf of the Ugandan government and people, together with the Korean people, highly appreciates the exploits Kim Jong Il, the eternal leader of the DPRK, performed for the Korean and other people of the world and his great life.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il had performed distinguished feats in the work to achieve the political, economic and social development of the DPRK and provide happiness of the Korean people.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Inspects Industrial Establishments
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Inspects Industrial Establishments
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju inspected major establishments in Pukchang and Tokchon.
					 Going round the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex, the Tokchon Area Coal-Mining Complex, the Tokchon Coal Mine and the Sungri Automobile Complex,  he learned in detail about the progress made in production and projects for expanding their capacities.
					
					 Consultative meetings of officials concerned were held on the spots.
					
					 They discussed measures to keep equipment in full operation and capacity by dint of science and technology and increase the production of electricity and coal.
					
					 Steps were also taken to give fullest play to the mental power of technicians and skilled workers to step up the technological updating of production processes and sufficiently supply raw and other materials needed for the serial production of new-type trucks.
					
					 The premier also inspected the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory, where he acquainted himself with the progress made in updating the factory and called for stepping up the construction.

articles.title: KNS Delegation Departs
articles.content:
KNS Delegation Departs
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean News Service (KNS) of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan led by Director Choe Hong left here on Saturday after taking part in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean Central News Agency.

articles.title: Endless Stream of Service Personnel and People Visit Phyongchon Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Endless Stream of Service Personnel and People Visit Phyongchon Revolutionary Site
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- 250,000 service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children of more than 2,270 units visited the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site since it was remodeled. 
					 The revolutionary site is the place where President Kim Il Sung guided a test fire of the first submachine gun made by the workers.
					
					 The visitors went round the monument to field guidance, a submachine-gun performance test ground and submachine-gun firing range which are associated with the feats of the peerlessly great persons who chose the site for the first arsenal in the liberated country and paved an untrodden path for the nation's munitions industry.
					
					 They were briefed on the revolutionary relics of supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the site.

articles.title: Highly Efficient Waterproof Agents
articles.content:
Highly Efficient Waterproof Agents
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A great importance has been attached to diversifying the types and range of building materials in the DPRK.
					 As part of the efforts, the Taeha Trading Company under the Korean Kangan General Company mass-produces various kinds of "Taeha"-trademarked waterproof agents.
					
					 One of them is waterproof paint with superior low temperature bending and weather resistance, which has been proved effective in waterproofing the inside and outside of different structures like iron pipe.
					
					 Among them are also concrete-waterproof agent, which is well mixed with cement and has no chemical reaction on concrete bar, and bouncing waterproof putty to fill in cracks, which is highly resistant to heat and freezing.
					
					 According to Kim Un Dok, manager of the company, the waterproof agents are appreciated at home and abroad and have been applied to a number of construction projects in recent years.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, Songun Brilliant Commander
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, Songun Brilliant Commander
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was an outstanding Songun (military-first) brilliant commander who had demonstrated the dignity of the DPRK all over the world with his superb strategy and matchless pluck.
					 He proved in reality the truth that the arms of Songun are the strongest power to clear out the injustice and evil.
					
					 In the 1990s, a radical change was made in the world political structure.
					
					 Availing itself of this opportunity, the U.S. instigated the dishonest elements of the IAEA (International Atomic Energy Agency) to enforce "ad-hoc inspection" upon the DPRK under the pretext of "suspected nuclear development". And it resumed the risky Team Spirit 93 joint military exercises against the DPRK with over 200 000 aggression troops and a number of nuclear strike means involved.
					
					 To cope with this grave situation, an order of the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army was issued to declare a state of war readiness for the whole country, all the people and the entire army, which was followed by the statement of the DPRK government on its withdrawal from NPT.
					
					 The toughest counteraction of the DPRK evoked a worldwide admiration, while giving a shock to the U.S. administration.
					
					 The U.S. had no option but to sit down at negotiating table with the DPRK and, eventually, the DPRK-U.S. Agreed Framework was declared and the U.S. president sent a letter of guarantee to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Later, the DPRK emerged as a legitimate nuclear weapons state despite of the hostile forces' threat, blackmail, sanctions and pressure.
					
					 Such a wonderful event was entirely attributable to his Songun leadership.
					
					 Today, the DPRK is further demonstrating its dignity and might under the Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules Japan, Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules Japan, Human Rights Abuser
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The missing Japanese who were reportedly abducted by the DPRK are appearing one after another.
					 According to Sankei Shimbun, the public security department of the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Agency announced on Dec. 1 that Masanori Katsuki, who went missing in Etogawa District, Tokyo, at the age of 36 in Feb. 1985 and had been believed to be kidnapped by north Korea, was found in Japan in the latter half of November when he is 68 years old.
					
					 Earlier in June last the Fukui Prefectural police disclosed that Kazuya Miyauchi whom they claimed to be abducted by north Korea in 1997 at the age of 32 was found in Japan.
					
					 Japan has become reckless in the human rights campaign against the DPRK over the "abduction issue" already settled.
					
					 The appearance of the missing persons in recent years glaringly reveals truth about Japan's serious human rights abuses in the eyes of the international community.
					
					 It is a well-known fact that whenever an opportunity presented itself, Japan behaved mischievously under the guise of a "victim of abduction".
					
					 The Japanese government has taken the lead in the anti-DPRK campaign, extending the sanctions against the DPRK every year which were imposed on it under the pretext of the "abduction issue." It is evading its apology and reparation for its unprecedentedly hideous crimes against humanity in a bid to calm down the voices of the international community demanding it redress them.
					
					 In fact, Japan is a serious human rights abuser who is not entitled to take issue with the DPRK.
					
					 In the past Japan forcibly drafted over 8.4 million young and middle-aged Koreans to force them to slave labor or hurled many of them into shambles of war of aggression as cannon fodder and massacred more than one million Koreans in cold blood. Moreover, it forced 200 000 Korean women into sexual slavery for the imperial Japanese army, violating their chastity.
					
					 This notwithstanding, Japan played a leading role in the fabrication of the U.S.-sponsored anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" in the UN, becoming more talkative about "human rights" than anybody else.
					
					 Japan is styling itself "champion of human rights" though it made not only the people of Korea but also other Asian nations shed blood. This reminds one of a wolf pretending to be a lamb.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to reflect on itself as it is bereft of any elementary moral justification and decency.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts American-style "Championing of Human Rights"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts American-style "Championing of Human Rights"
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- It is 68 years since the World Declaration of Human Rights was adopted in reflection of the desire of mankind, but even at this moment a grave situation of human rights violation is prevailing on the earth.
					 Recently, the U.S. and its vassal forces again railroaded the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" full of lies and fabrications through the Third Committee of the 71st UN General Assembly.
					
					 Obama and the state secretary and other outgoing authorities of the U.S. are blustering that it is necessary to leave no means untried to settle "north Korea's human rights issue" and the U.S. Congress is claiming that it will extend the application of the "North Korean Human Rights Act" till 2022.
					
					 This represents an insult to the genuine human rights and the worst violation of the sovereignty of a nation.
					
					 Each country and nation has its own history and custom and way of life. Therefore, the system of ensuring human rights should be established as required by their people.
					
					 In particular, human rights precisely mean sovereignty and the people's rights to existence and development are guaranteed by powerful sovereignty.
					
					 In our country where the popular masses' independent rights and creative activities are guaranteed institutionally, there does not exist what the hostile forces call "human rights issue" and such thing can never do.
					
					 Their rackets to stifle the DPRK through sanctions under the pretext of "championing human rights" are doing serious harm to the economic development and the improvement of the standard of their people's living in the DPRK.
					
					 Such barbarous actions taken by the U.S. under the pretext of "protection of human rights" are now claiming huge casualties and a large number of refugees across the world.
					
					 The U.S. made no scruple of perpetrating state-sponsored terrorism, massacres and other unethical crimes unprecedented in the history of mankind under the pretexts of "color revolution," "anti-terrorism war," etc.
					
					 The rights of many countries and nations are not "protected" but violated in cold blood owing to the U.S.-led Afghan, Iraqi and Libyan wars and its political and military interference in the internal affairs of Syria and indiscriminate air raids on peaceable inhabitants and mediaeval torturein overseas secret prisons.
					
					 The U.S. is meddling in the internal affairs of other countries and nations and infringing upon their sovereignty, styling itself "world human rights judge". This is nothing but the worst challenge to the human rights and their violation.
					
					 The U.S. is the worst human rights abuser in the world as the world community comments.
					
					 The final document of the 17th non-aligned summit and the declaration of the 77-group ministerial meeting held during the 71st UN General Assembly reflect a stern judgment passed on the American-style "human rights standards" and the will to champion the genuine human rights.
					
					 Those countries and nations desirous of independence should heighten their vigilance against the U.S. propaganda about "championing human rights" aimed at abusing them for its political purposes and wage a dynamic struggle against it.

articles.title: History of DPRK Is Just One of Kim Jong Il: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
History of DPRK Is Just One of Kim Jong Il: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates an article to the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Korea's history is always shining as the history of Kim Jong Il, the article says, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the eternal sun of Juche that provided an eternal cornerstone for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche started by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The past five years represent a glorious history in which a steady continuity is given to Kim Jong Il's history of revolutionary leadership and the course of grand general advance in which the cause of building a powerful socialist country associated with his whole life has made a more dynamic advance.
					
					 They also represent an unforgettable history in which a steady continuity is given to Kim Jong Il's history of prioritizing, respecting and loving the people. 
					
					 Though he passed away, the path of our revolution remains unchanged and there is no political instability in the DPRK.
					
					 Successful satellite launches and steady victories in the fierce nuclear confrontation with the imperialists are a shining victory of Kim Jong Il's style spirit of offensive.
					
					 Our Party leads the army and the people to give fullest play to their mental power and bring about great innovations through a revolutionary ideological offensive under the uplifted banner of the self-development first principle. This is the embodiment of Kim Jong Il's political mode whereby he found himself among people and motivated them to settle any problem, always reposing firm belief in their strength, wisdom and good disposition in the whole period of his revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The history of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea will be given steady continuity as the leader and the army and people are united as one in mind in holding in high esteem the great leaders forever.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Will Have to Pay Dearly for Their Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Will Have to Pay Dearly for Their Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The waves of fierce mass actions sweeping across south Korea are an eruption of the pent-up wrath and resentment against the Park Geun Hye group who have gone reckless in sycophancy and treachery, fascist rule and confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, going against the desire and demands of the people, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 They are hordes of traitors to the nation as they have turned south Korea into a complete colony by selling off the dignity and interests of the nation through unprecedented sycophantic and traitorous politics.
					
					 Traitor Park has brought unbearable shame to the south Korean people by infringing upon the dignity and interests of the nation to serve the purpose of boosting the cooperation with foreign forces in the campaign for escalating the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The Park group are the sworn enemy of the people as they have stamped out democracy through a fascist rule, inflicting misfortune and sufferings and death upon the toiling masses to meet the interests of a handful of privileged class and conglomerates.
					
					 No sooner had Park come to power than she advocated such confrontational policies as "confidence-building process", thus blatantly challenging the sincere and positive efforts of the fellow countrymen in the north for the reconciliation and unity between the north and the south of Korea and scuppering the hard-won opportunities of dialogue. She also shut down the Kaesong Industrial Park, ditching the last project to repair the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The Park group have desperately kicked up the nuclear and "human rights" racket to stifle the fellow countrymen in the north in collusion with foreign forces, talking about "nuclear threat from the north" and "human rights performance in the north". They were so ridiculous as to take the lead in implementing the U.S. sanctions against the DPRK, crying out for the "harshest sanctions." 
					
					 The south Korean people are now demanding the arrest and merciless punishment of traitor Park, not just her resignation.
					
					 Reflecting such public mind-set, the anti-"government" actions are furiously being waged across south Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Traitor Park Struggling to Stay in Power
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Traitor Park Struggling to Stay in Power
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea met the representative and the floor leader of the "Saenuri Party" at Chongwadae some days ago and uttered that even though the motion calling for her impeachment passed through the "National Assembly", she would keep following how it is handled at the "constitutional court" and that she is ready to face it in a composed and calm manner. She added that she would accept the "Saenuri Party's" decision on "resignation in April and presidential election in June" with an intention to "settle the political situation in a stable way."
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says that what she uttered is nothing but a foolish ploy to prolong her remaining days as a "vegetable president" even a bit and a desperate bid of the Chongwadae witch to challenge the public mindset to the last moments of going to her grave.
					
					 The aim sought by her is to maintain the present situation as long as possible and to while away time, rally the conservative forces again and tide over the crisis in the end, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 No matter what cynical ploy Park, an old witch and psychopath without an equal, may resort to in order to mock at the public, seized with her limitless greed for power, it will only result in precipitating her miserable doom.
					
					 A south Korean media shortly ago said that it is very disgusting to see Park seeking greed for power till the last moments, asserting that they can not leave state affairs to her even a second as she lacks even normal judgment.
					
					 This is the unanimous stand of the south Korean public.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. World's Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. World's Worst Human Rights Abuser
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Words human rights do not fit the U.S. as its administration and its followers are the worst human rights abusers finding fault with others while styling themselves "human rights champion", says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary. 
					 The U.S. is unilaterally imposing its own unreasonable "human rights standards" upon other countries and nations while noisily talking about "human rights". This is aimed to make Western view on value and lifestyle prevail in all countries and westernize the whole world, the commentary notes, adding: Herein lies the reactionary nature of the "human rights" rhetoric let out by the U.S.
					
					 The commentary cites facts to prove that U.S. is using "human rights" as a signboard for violating the sovereignty of other countries and nations and it is a stark fact that its "human rights" rhetoric is always accompanied by armed intervention and serious human rights abuses.
					
					 It is the U.S. that has infringed upon the sovereignty of other countries and nations and violated their elementary rights to existence, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. trumpets about "human rights" more loudly than others, an insult and mockery of genuine human rights.
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. may try to cover up its aggression, intervention and human rights abuses under the signboard of "protection of human rights," it only glaringly reveals its criminal nature.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. justify or cover up the reactionary, deceptive and aggressive nature of its "human rights" propaganda.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Urges "Saenuri Party" to Force Park Geun Hye to Step Down
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Urges "Saenuri Party" to Force Park Geun Hye to Step Down
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the Kwangju Citizens Movement held a press conference in front of the Kwangju and South Jolla Provincial Building of the "Saenuri Party" on December 7, urging the party to opt for ousting Park Geun Hye, according to the south Korean News 1.
					 Speakers at the conference referred to the fact that the people let loose their fury to Park Geun Hye for having abused "state power" and urged the "Saenuri Party" to take the responsibility as an accomplice.
					
					 They said that the party should join the people's action demanding the immediate resignation of Park Geun Hye.

articles.title: S. Korean Forces Stage Joint Firing Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Forces Stage Joint Firing Drill
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers staged a joint firing drill against the DPRK in the sea and air near Phohang of North Kyongsang Province on Dec. 8, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 More than ten warships, including destroyer and patrol craft of the First Fleet of the south Korean Navy, and warplanes of the air force were mobilized in the drill.
					
					 Earlier on Dec. 7, nine air defense units including the First Air Defense Brigade of the Army Metropolitan Garrison Command conducted guided-missile firing drill at a firing range in South Chungchong Province.

articles.title: S. Korea: Opposition Parties Launch All-night Actions to Impeach Park
articles.content:
S. Korea: Opposition Parties Launch All-night Actions to Impeach Park
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Opposition parties of south Korea launched all-night actions for passing a bill on impeachment of Park Geun Hye on Thursday, according to MBS of south Korea.
					The Minju Party sponsored a candle-light rally and a plenary meeting of its lawmakers till late at night before staging a sit-in outside the "National Assembly" building where an impeachment vote was to take place.
					
					Lawmakers from the Party of People and the Jongui Party, too, staged a sit-in all night demanding the passing of the impeachment bill through the NA.
					
					Declaring that they would do their best to pass the bill, they expressed their will to resign from their parliamentary posts and opt for dissolving the NA in case they fail to pass the bill.

articles.title: Actions for Resignation of Park's Regime Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Resignation of Park's Regime Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The press trade union of south Korea reportedly held an all-out rally outside the building of the ruling "Saenuri Party" on Thursday, in demand of the resignation of the chief executive.
					 Speakers at the rally called for ousting Park Geun Hye and frustrating her regime's moves to put media under control.
					
					 That day the emergency people's action for ousting the Park regime held a candle-light rally in Youido of Seoul, urging the passing of a bill on impeachment of Park.

articles.title: Bill on Impeachment of Park Geun Hye Passed through NA of S. Korea
articles.content:
Bill on Impeachment of Park Geun Hye Passed through NA of S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A bill on impeachment of Park Geun Hye, the chief executive of south Korea, was passed through the "National Assembly" on Friday amid the strong demand of the civic and social bodies, opposition parties and people of various circles for her resignation, according to media reports from Seoul.
					 234 of 299 lawmakers who took part in the vote at the NA said yes to the impeachment of Park.
					
					 Reporting the results of the vote, CBS of south Korea said Park would be ousted if the "constitutional court" decides on the impeachment within six months.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Immediate Resignation Demanded by S. Korean Religious Organizations
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Immediate Resignation Demanded by S. Korean Religious Organizations
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Roman Catholic Church and other religious organizations issued statements reflecting their stands on Park Geun Hye's resignation on December 7, according to a report.
					 The statements said that the "president" should not put off days with despicable partisan calculation if she wants to be sincere to the voice of the people demanding her resignation.
					
					 The Emergency Situation Measure Council of the south Korean Council of Christian Churches held a press conference in Seoul on the same day and released a declaration on the situation of 11 584 Christians.
					
					 The declaration said that if Park Geun Hye has even a bit shred of conscience and responsibility, she should immediately resign true to the will of the people, not resorting to the political wiles.
					
					 The "constitutional court" should follow the will of the people by immediately deciding upon her resignation.

articles.title: Candlelight Action for Independence, Democracy, Reunification Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Action for Independence, Democracy, Reunification Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea held a Thursday meeting in Seoul on December 8, calling for staging a candlelight action for independence, democracy and reunification, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 Speakers said at the meeting that the candlelight action should be staged to greet a new era of independence, democracy and reunification when the old system is overthrown, the "Security Law" abolished and all prisoners of conscience are released and the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration implemented.
					
					 They demanded the resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime, the withdrawal of the decision on the THAAD deployment and the repeal of the SL.

articles.title: "Action in Capital" for Park Geun Hye's Immediate Resignation Staged by S. Korean Farmers
articles.content:
"Action in Capital" for Park Geun Hye's Immediate Resignation Staged by S. Korean Farmers
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- An action organization of south Korea grouping members of the Federation of Peasants Associations held a kick-off ceremony in Kyonggi Province on December 8 and started the second "action in the capital" demanding Park Geun Hye's immediate resignation.
					 The organization said that it would drive tractors towards Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul via Suwon. 
					
					 Earlier, it held a press conference on Dec. 5, at which it clarified the "action plan" and issued the second appeal for action.
					
					 They said that the day when the tractors entered the Kwanghwamun plaza would be the day when the Park Geun regime comes to an end and an independent and democratic regime emerges.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Demand Park Geun Hye's Resignation
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Demand Park Geun Hye's Resignation
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Overseas compatriots living in Japan, the U.S., China, Russia, Canada and Germany on Dec. 6 made public a joint statement denouncing Park Geun Hye, troublemaker and bete noire of history, and strongly urging her to step down.
					 The statement said the whole of south Korea is shaking with its people's anger at her, adding:
					
					 Crowds of 1.7 million candlelight holders on Dec. 3 encircled Chongwadae and 2.32 million people turned out in an all-people resistance across south Korea.
					
					 Park should properly understand how tremendous the strength of the people is and how bitter their anger is.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Ukraine
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Ukraine
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Ukraine on December 5 with due ceremony.
					 Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The inaugural ceremony adopted a decision on forming remembrance committees at all organizations for the study of the Juche idea and holding political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and undying exploits of Kim Jong Il on the fifth anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's History of Party Leadership Praised in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's History of Party Leadership Praised in Venezuela
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The United Left Party of Venezuela issued a bulletin on Dec. 3 to commemorate the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The bulletin said that Kim Jong Il's decades-long history of party leadership is shining with the undying exploits he performed to turn the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into a united steel-like vanguard and genuine political organization.
					
					 Noting that he authored "The Workers' Party of Korea is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" and other famous works to declare the will of the WPK to faithfully carry forward the idea and exploits of Kim Il Sung, the bulletin went on:
					
					 He formulated the Songun politics as a basic mode of politics under socialism, in keeping with the requirements of the changed harsh situation and the era of independence against imperialism, and led the WPK to open the road to prosperity by dint of the Songun politics.
					
					 The high prestige and invincible might of the WPK and its feats for the revolution and construction would have been unthinkable without leadership of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering leader Kim Jong Il took place in Austria, Switzerland, Germany, the Czech Republic and Venezuela from Nov. 28 to Dec. 3.
					 The chairman of the Austrian Committee for Remembering H.E. Kim Jong Il said that leader Kim Jong Il was an iron-willed commander and an elder statesman of the world as he reliably defended Korean socialism, powerfully aroused all the Korean people to the building of a socialist power, opened up a new turn for Korea's reunification and victoriously advanced the cause of independence of mankind.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee stressed that Kim Jong Il's exploits for the era and mankind would remain forever.
					
					 The chief of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany said the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il are invincible and the future of Korea is rosy as it is guided by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association said that the DPRK could always emerge victorious in the face of the hostile forces' vicious challenges as Kim Jong Il laid a solid foundation for the accomplishment of the socialist cause of Juche. 
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea said the sacred image of Kim Jong Il, who devoted his all to the bright future of Korea and its people and the global independence, would be always kept in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the Venezuelan and other progressive peoples.
					
					 The chairman of the Venezuelan National Committee for Remembering Comrade Kim Jong Il said that the reality of the DPRK now making rapid progress is a brilliant fruition of the distinguished leadership of Kim Jong Un carrying the behests of Kim Jong Il into practice.

articles.title: Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed in Russia
articles.content:
Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed in Russia
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Sankt-Peterburg of Russia on December 5.
					 Vadim Kudimin, director of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the fifth anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was brought out in booklet by the Knizhnii Mir Publishing House of Russia on December 5. 
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea. And it indicates the tasks for steadily strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje del Presidente de Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje del Presidente de Uganda
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje que le remitiera el 24 de noviembre el Presidente de la Republica de Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni. 
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					En nombre del gobierno y pueblo de la Republica de Uganda, aprecio mucho junto con el pueblo coreano las hazanas de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, eterno lider de la RPDC, realizadas para el pueblo coreano y los demas del mundo, y su vida grandiosa.
					
					El realizo las proezas extraordinarias en el camino por lograr el desarrollo politico-economico y social de la RPDC y preparar la felicidad del pueblo coreano.
					
					Su Excelencia, reciba el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: PTC saluda 60o aniversario de fundacion del MPLA
articles.content:
PTC saluda 60o aniversario de fundacion del MPLA
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 9 un mensaje de felicitacion al Comite Central del Movimiento Popular de Liberacion de Angola (MPLA) con motivo del 60o aniversario de fundacion de esta organizacion. 
					La misiva senala que durante 60 anos desde su fundacion, el MPLA logro la independencia del pais y defendio la soberania nacional mediante la ardua lucha armada y alcanzo grandes exitos en las labores para consolidar la estabilidad politica del pais y la armonia nacional y lograr el desarrollo socioeconomico. 
					
					Expresa la satisfaccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre el PTC y el MPLA, que tienen larga historia y excelente tradicion, se ampliaran y se desarrollaran cada dia mas conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de ambos paises en la lucha conjunta por la independencia antiimperialista. 
					
					Manifiesta la conviccion de que en el futuro tambien, los vinculos entre el PTC y el MPLA seguiran desarrollandose favorablemente y desea de todo corazon mayores exitos en las labores del MPLA para alcanzar con exito las ambiciosas metas presentadas por su VII Congreso y lograr el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Premier coreano visita varias entidades de Pukchang y Tokchon
articles.content:
Premier coreano visita varias entidades de Pukchang y Tokchon
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno las gestiones de las empresas importantes en las regiones de Pukchang y Tokchon.
					Durante su recorrido por el Complejo Termoelectrico de Pukchang, la mina de carbon de Tokchon del Complejo Carbonifero de la Region de Tokchon y el Complejo Automovilistico Sungri, enfrascados en la creacion de innovaciones y meritos, se informo de los detalles de produccion y ampliacion de su capacidad.
					
					En las reuniones consultivas de los funcionarios interesados convocadas en el terreno, se discutieron los remedios para aumentar la produccion de electricidad y carbon asegurando el pleno funcionamiento de equipos y tomando la ciencia y tecnica como cuestion vital.
					
					Se tomaron las medidas para acelerar la reconstruccion tecnica de procesos productivos al poner en juego las fuerzas espirituales de tecnicos y obreros calificados, y suministrar suficientemente las materias primas y materiales necesarios para producir en serie los camiones de nuevo tipo.
					
					Anteriormente, visito la Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Pyongyang donde averiguo como marcha la obra de modernizacion y destaco la necesidad de acelerarla.

articles.title: ACNC comenta "defensa de DDHH" por el estilo de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC comenta "defensa de DDHH" por el estilo de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Aunque se cumplen 68 anos desde la aprobacion de la Declaracion Mundial de DDHH conforme a la aspiracion de la humanidad, prosiguen hoy tambien en el globo terraqueo graves actos de violacion de DDHH. 
					Recientemente, EE.UU. y las fuerzas seguidoras volvieron a aprobar de modo coercitivo en el tercer comite de la 71a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC, penetrada de datos falsos y manipulados.
					
					Las autoridades norteamericanas, inclusive Obama y el secretario de Estado que concluiran su mandato dentro de poco, insisten en "tomar todas las medidas para la solucion del problema de DDHH del Norte de Corea". 
					
					A su vez, el Congreso estadounidense anuncia prorrogar hasta el ano 2022 la "ley de DDHH del Norte de Corea". 
					
					Este hecho deviene insulto a los verdaderos derechos humanos y grave atentado contra la soberania nacional.
					
					Ya que son diferentes las historias, costumbres y modos de vida de cada pais y nacion, el sistema de aseguramiento de DDHH debe ser establecido de acuerdo con las demandas de los respectivos pueblos. 
					
					En particular, los DDHH son los estatales y el derecho a la vida, la subsistencia y el desarrollo del pueblo se garantizan con la soberania nacional. 
					
					En nuestro pais, donde se garantizan institucionalmente los derechos soberanos y las actividades creativas de las masas populares, no existe ni puede existir el "problema de DDHH" que cuestionan tanto las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					La campana de sancion y aplastamiento anti-RPDC del imperio y sus satelites, que se lanza bajo el rotulo de "defensa de DDHH", causa enormes danos para el desarrollo economico y la mejora de vida poblacional en el pais socialista. 
					
					Debido a las acciones atroces de EE.UU. justificadas con el cartel de "proteccion de DDHH", se reportan hoy tambien por doquier del mundo cientos de miles de muertos y millones de refugiados. 
					
					Se cometen sin vacilacion alguna los actos criminales antieticos, el terrorismo de Estado y la masacre sin precedentes en la historia de la humanidad bajo el pretexto de la "revolucion de color" y la "guerra antiterrorista". 
					
					Se violan flagrantemente los derechos humanos de muchos paises y naciones debido a las guerras patrocinadas por EE.UU. contra Afganistan, Irak, Libia y su intervencion politico-militar en Siria, el indiscriminado ataque aereo contra los civiles pacificos y las torturas medievales que se ejecutan en las prisiones secretas en otros paises.
					
					Portandose como "juez mundial de DDHH", el imperio interviene abiertamente en asuntos internos de otros paises y naciones y viola la soberania de ellos, lo cual significa el desafio mas brutal a los DDHH.
					
					Como evalua la opinion publica mundial, EE.UU. es el peor violador de DDHH.
					
					El documento final de la 17a cumbre del MNOAL y la declaracion de la reunion ministerial del Grupo-77, sostenida durante la 71a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU, significan una sentencia de la sociedad internacional contra la "pauta de DDHH" al estilo norteamericano, siendo una expresion de la voluntad de defender los verdaderos derechos humanos. 
					
					Los paises y naciones aspirantes a la independencia deben elevar la vigilancia sobre la "proteccion de DDHH" de EE.UU., que malemplea este tema en sus objetivos politicos, y librar una lucha intensa contra ella.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la aparicion de desaparecidos en Japon
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la aparicion de desaparecidos en Japon
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Aparecen uno tras otro en el interior de Japon los desaparecidos "secuestrados" por el Norte de Corea, segun la insistencia de las autoridades japonesas. 
					Segun Sankei Shimbun, el Departamento de Seguridad Publica de la Policia Metropolitana de Tokio anuncio el primero de diciembre que se ha descubierto en la segunda quincena de noviembre en el interior del pais Masanori Katsuki de 68 anos, desaparecido a la edad de 36 en febrero de 1985 en Etogawa de la metropoli de Tokio, de quien no se descartaba la posibilidad de haber sido secuestro por el Norte de Corea. 
					
					Con anterioridad, la policia del departamento de Fukui publico en julio que aparecio Kazuya Miyauchi que fue desaparecido cuando tenia 32 anos. Se decia que es innegable la posibilidad de su secuestro por el Norte de Corea en el ano 1997.
					
					Tales hechos demuestran a la sociedad internacional la deplorable situacion de derechos humanos de Japon que viene librando la febril campana de DDHH contra la RPDC acusandola del ya resuelto "problema de secuestro". 
					
					Ya es conocido por todos que Japon se porto mal con la RPDC haciendose la "victima de secuestro". 
					
					El gobierno japones esta al frente de la campana anti-RPDC renovando cada ano las medidas de "sancion" tomadas bajo el pretexto del "problema de secuestro" y elude la disculpa y la indemnizacion desoyendo la demanda de la sociedad internacional sobre la liquidacion de sus inauditos crimenes antieticos del siglo pasado. 
					
					En realidad, Japon es el pais violador de DDHH que no tiene nada que decir a la RPDC sobre este tema. 
					
					En el pasado, el pais isleno arresto forzadamente a mas de 8 millones 400 mil jovenes y adultos coreanos para imponerles el trabajo de esclavitud medieval y lanzarlos como carnes de canon a las guerras de agresion y asesino atrozmente a mas de un millon de coreanos. Ademas, convirtio a 200 mil mujeres coreanas en esclavas sexuales para sus uniformados bestiales. 
					
					A pesar de esto, sin liquidar todavia su expediente criminal contra los DDHH, jugo el papel medular en la fabricacion del "proyecto de resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC de la ONU, patrocinada por EE.UU., y habla mas que nadie de los "derechos humanos". 
					
					El pais isleno, que mato a incontables habitantes de Corea y otros paises asiaticos, se porta como "defensor de DDHH", lo cual es el climax de cinismo. 
					
					Japon debe reflexionar si tiene la calificacion para hablar de DDHH.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica actitud desafiante de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica actitud desafiante de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hace unos dias, la traidora Park Geun-hye invito a Chongwadae al representante y al representante parlamentario del "Partido Saenuri" y les dijo que observaria el "proceso de gestion en la Corte Constitucional" aunque "sea aprobada en la Asamblea Nacional la mocion de su dimision" y esta dispuesta a "retirarse con serenidad y tranquilidad". Y anadio que aceptaria la "opinion del Partido Saenuri" sobre la "retirada en abril y las elecciones presidenciales anticipadas en junio", partiendo de su "idea de remediar con estabilidad la situacion politica".
					El periodico Rodong Sinmun publico el dia 10 un comentario individual que se burla de la chismografia de Park para dilatar su precaria vida politica.
					
					Asi que la bruja de Chongwadae quiere desafiar a la opinion publica hasta el ultimo momento de su fin politico, critica el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					Ella intenta salir de la crisis actual al ganar el tiempo manteniendo a toda costa la situacion actual y reagrupar las fuerzas conservadoras.
					
					Park, anciana enloquecida por el poder y psicopata incurable, quiere burlarse de la opinion publica con trucos baratos, pero este comportamiento le pondra en la situacion mas apretada.
					
					Hace poco, un medio de prensa surcoreano califico de abominable a Park Geun-hye que no deja su ambicion del poder hasta el ultimo momento, e insistio en que no se puede confiarle ni un segundo la "administracion del Estado" ya que ella perdio la capacidad de juicio normal.
					
					Comparte tal opinion todo el pueblo surcoreano.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de violador No.1 de derechos humanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de violador No.1 de derechos humanos
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Para EE.UU. no le suena bien la misma palabra "derechos humanos", critica asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado este sabado y continua:
					El imperio americano y sus lacayos son verdaderos violadores de derechos humanos aunque ellos calumnian a otros paises en este tema autodenominandose como "defensores de DDHH". 
					
					EE.UU. intenta imponer unilateralmente su injusta "pauta de DDHH" a otros paises y naciones a fin de hacer reinar en todo el mundo la concepcion de valor y modo de vida al estilo occidental. 
					
					He aqui el caracter reaccionario de su insistencia en la "defensa de derechos humanos". 
					
					Ese pais utiliza este problema como un pretexto para violar y socavar la soberania de otros paises y naciones. 
					
					Realmente, detras de su acusacion en materia de DDHH, vienen la intervencion armada y los crimenes de violacion de DDHH manchados de sangre. 
					
					El violador No.1 de DDHH esta acabando hasta con el elemental derecho a la subsistencia de otros paises y naciones. 
					
					Sin embargo, habla mas alto que nadie de los derechos humanos, lo cual es insulto y burla a los genuinos DDHH. 
					
					Aunque el imperio actua con astucia para encubrir sus actos de agresion, intervencion y violacion de DDHH que se cometen bajo el cartel de "defensa de DDHH", se revela con mas claridad su naturaleza criminal. 
					
					No se puede justificar ni ocultar por nada el caracter reaccionario, enganoso y agresivo de su canturreo sobre la "defensa de DDHH".
